text: Kristin Danielsen (born 1972) is a Norwegian dancer, choreographer and cultural administrator. She was born in Arendal. She was trained as dancer at Den norske balletthøgskole in Oslo and the Broadway Dance Centre in New York City, and graduated as Master of Arts Management from the City, University of London. After a career as dancer and choreographer, she assumed various administrative positions. From 1999 to 2001 she was manager of the in Oslo, and she was producer at the Danse- og teatersentrum from 2001 to 2002. She further held administrative positions at Ny Musikk (2006–2010), Det Norske Teatret (2010–2011), MIC Norsk musikkinformasjon (2011–2013), and Oslo Public Library (2014-2016). She was appointed Director of the Arts Council Norway in 2016. ==References== Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:People from Arendal Category:Norwegian female dancers Category:Norwegian choreographers Category:Norwegian expatriates in England Category:Norwegian expatriates in the United States Category:Directors of government agencies of Norway
title: Kristin Danielsen (dancer)
